metadata.synopsis: AD with the Emperor when the players enter the bridge near Baldur's Gate (the gate). Second warning state. The emperor apply the players a slower status.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the trigger on Baldur's Gate (the gate) bridge.

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: Listen to me - if you go any further, the brain will dominate us. We are not ready.
